BEBaseFoundation.stf_meta_keywords: event venues, event planning, events in Australia, incentives in Australia, MICE in Australia, business in Australia, meeting planners, conventions, congresses, association events in Australia, news
BEBaseFoundation.stf_meta_description: Find the latest news and statistics on business events in Australia. Media releases, articles and industry updates from Australia.
BEBaseFoundation.stf_PageTitle: Australia - Meetings, Incentives and Conferences – Official Website

BEGenericHeaderAndConentBody.txt_HTML:
Countdown to Dreamtime 2013
November 2013
In less than four weeks, 86 business events planners and decision makers (buyers) and 15 media from key international markets will descend on Australia to participate in Dreamtime 2013.

PAICE Expo - Australia on show
November 2013
2013 marks Tourism Australia Business Events’ sixth year of sponsorship of the annual PAICE Expo, to be held at SKYCITY Auckland’s Convention Centre on November 13.

Tourism Australia announces Singapore Airlines as gold sponsor for Dreamtime 2013
November 2013
Singapore Airlines has been announced as the second airline partner and gold sponsor for Dreamtime 2013, Tourism Australia’s signature activity for the growing business events market.

US a key focus for the Australian business events industry
October 2013
The Australia business events industry has responded to the return of the US market with a strong representation joining Tourism Australia at IMEX America.

Tourism Australia announces Virgin Australia as platinum sponsor for signature event - Dreamtime 2013
November 2013
Virgin Australia has been announced as platinum sponsor and the first airline partner for Dreamtime 2013, Tourism Australia’s signature activity for the growing business events market.

Herbalife China delegates touch down on Australia's Gold Coast
May 2013
More than 1,000 Chinese delgates arrived on the Gold Coast over the weekend for the Herbalife Leadership Vacation 2013, for a five-day visit to reward the global nutrition company's top sellers.

Amway delegates make Australian history in Melbourne
December 2012
More than 4,000 Indian delegates arrived in Melbourne today for the Amway India Leadership Seminar 2012 in what will be the largest Indian incentive group ever to be hosted in Australia.
